ðŸ“– Summary: DllShimmer is a Go-based tool for weaponizing DLL hijacking. It allows users to backdoor functions within DLLs without disrupting normal process operation by generating proxy DLLs with identical exports to the original, enabling the injection of custom code into those functions.
